content: a very simple colour changing chain garland which requires no sewing i ve used 2 balls of yarn to make a chain about 3 5m long 35 links but the length is up to you make the chain as long as you like it would be fun to add a few links every year what a great idea for a crafty christmas tradition this crochet paper chain pattern is very easy the yarn does all the hard work for you gauge not critical to project outcome
